mapper.select: SELECT l.lo_id,g.eg_special_context,u.eu_receipt_name,u.eu_receipt_phone,u.eu_sender_name,u.eu_sender_phone,t.it_name,ls.ls_context FROM logistics_orders l INNER JOIN express_goods g ON l.eg_id=g.eg_id INNER JOIN express_user u ON l.eu_id=u.eu_id INNER JOIN item_type t ON g.it_id=t.it_id INNER JOIN transportation_status s ON l.ts_id=s.ts_id INNER JOIN logistics_status ls ON s.ls_id=ls.ls_id
